query:
SELECT
                r.id as release_id,
                r.release_intent_id,
                r.destination_id,
                r.status,
                ri.artifact,
                ri.project_id
            FROM releases r
            JOIN release_intents ri ON r.release_intent_id = ri.id
            WHERE r.status = 'STAGED'
            LIMIT 1
            FOR UPDATE OF r
            SKIP LOCKED
